subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following kings is associated with the construction of Mehrangarh Fort?
question_hi: किस मंत्री मेहनगर की बनाई पर संबंधित है।
explanation_en:
Pratap Singh is known for the construction of Mehrangarh Fort, but the actual builder of the fort is Rao Jodha.
English Answer: B
Hindi Answer: ब (B)
explanation_hi:
प्रताप सिंह मेहनंतर के बनाई पर संबंधित है। बैंकर जोधा का वर्णित बनाई है।
हिंदी उत्तर: ब (B)
explanation_en:
Pratap Singh is associated with the construction of Mehrangarh Fort, but the actual builder of the fort is Rao Jodha.
English Answer: B
English Explanation: Bankar Jodha ka varna bana hai.
Hindi Explanation: ब (B)

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which king is considered the founder of the Chittorgarh Fort?
question_hi: चैतोगार की भागतीनी कौंकना कौंकना कौंकना कौंकना कौंकना कौंकना कौंर्णी कौंकना कौंर्णी कौंकना र्यांकना रींकना
explanation_en:
King Rana Kumbha is considered the founder of Chittorgarh Fort.
English Answer: Kumbha
Hindi Explanation: कुंभा रांनी कुंभा रानी कुंभा

subject: Rajasthan History

explanation_en.explanation_en:
